transcript:
Customer: Teen sir aur channel karai nahi abhi.

Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Good evening sir. Haan ji.
Customer: Sir meri aapse baat meri aapse baat hui thi aur aapne abhi feedback gaya tha aapne usko not satisfied kar diya kya reason tha uska?
Customer: Meri baat hui thi uske liye proper main pehle bhi keh chuka hoon main IndiaMART pe lag ke baitha rahun possible nahi hai.
Executive: Sir meri meri baat suno meri baat suno jab jo tumhare sales wale bande aaye the un logon se bhi yahi wali baat kahi thi.
Customer: Mera mere ko customer apne aap chahiye.
Customer: Agar main ye sab karunga to mere mere main customer dhundhne ki mujhe jarurat kya hai?
Executive: To sir aapko thoda sa active rehna padega main aapko call to wahi to samjha raha tha aapko during ye iske ye iske platform pe active rahunga.
Executive: Sir IndiaMART pe aapko active rehna hai sir.
Executive: Ye feedback to sir mere liye tha na sir main to aapko isiliye main aapko continuously ek mahine se phone kar raha hoon ki sir aap ek bar thoda sa catalog pe kaam karwa lijiye aap sirf na 5 minute 10 minute ka bhi time denge IndiaMART mein aapne bola aapke staff person hai wo manage karta hai isliye maine aapko time leke aaj call kiya sir.
Executive: Ye feedback to mere liye tha na sir.
Customer: Main aapse maine aapka aapse meri dopahar mein baat bhi ho rahi thi na sir to aapko shayad koi call wagera aa gaya tha shayad aapne disconnect kar diya tha last mein.
Customer: Bataiye main ispe kya kaam catalog pe aapke work kar raha tha catalog pe main work kar kar raha tha us time mein aapne catalog pe work nahi karwaya aapne bola main khud se karunga catalog pe work sir.
Executive: Aapko sir sirf na 10 minute ka main time main time nahi de sakta seedhi baat suniye.
Customer: Agar main in cheezon pe time lunga to fir mere paas aur bhi bahut cheeze hain.
Executive: Sir aap to bata rahe aapke staff person hai koi aapke liye
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer marked feedback as not satisfied.

- Customer wants customers on their own.

- Customer does not want to spend time on IndiaMART.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the importance of being active.

- Executive asked to spend 5-10 minutes on catalog.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- feedback, catalog, active, indiamart
